name: DIVE (itch) (Redpool)
description:
Welcome to the "Totally Professional Research Crew". You're tasked with plumbing the unknown depths for their vast and mysterious riches - mostly consisting of hastily cobbled together resources and dastardly enemies.

Fight the good fight against questionable controls and even worse design decisions in this harrowing tale of the enduring spirit of man. 

Every dive is procedurally generated so it's always a unique blend of awful!

Roll your eyes at the engaging and expertly woven together narrative.

Upgrade your sub to make the game actually kinda fun. Turbo speed makes everything better. Bring glorious light to the depths with the super awesome beam upgrade!

Made in under a week for the Brackeys Game Jam 2018 using no Asset packs

Made using: Unity 2018, Aseprite, Ableton, Discord

The G-Team: Redpool (Design, Writing UI, Polish), Fobri (Code, Procedural Generation, Mechanics), Penca53 (Code, Dialogue, Misc.), Babipoki (Art, all the art!)
